After watching this movie, I couldn't help but notice the parallels between it and another film called America 3000. Both were very bad mid 1980's scifi movies that feature a girl who fantasizes about robots (like Wall-e) making her life better. In both cases she risks everything to escape into space where all of her one dimensional undesirable qualities are suddenly seen as wonderful.

While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent economy. In the end, they channel their problems over to other alleged 'La-La Landers' who go screaming off into space chasing another stray planet. Actually what follows are recent wild-eyed satellite images of galaxies colliding.
